alert.note: Alert for East Central Plains; Northeast Plains (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued March 08 at 5:01AM MST until March 09 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT WEDNESDAY FOR PARTS OF EASTERN NM DUE TO STRONG WINDS AND LOW HUMIDITY... .Strong west to southwest winds with low humidity will spread across eastern NM Wednesday afternoon where critical fire weather conditions are expected. ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... The National Weather Service in Albuquerque has issued a Fire Weather Watch...which is in effect Wednesday afternoon. * AREA AND TIMING...Northeast and East Central Plains Wednesday afternoon. * 20 FOOT WINDS...West to southwest 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 40 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...10 to 15%. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: Please advise the appropriate officials or fire crews in the field of this Fire Weather Watch.
